sign_up_with_your_mobile_number: Sign up with your mobile number
note: Note: E.g. bring change for Rs. 500.00
order_submit_msg: You will receive a confirmation notification once the store accept your order
Something_wrong_Please_try_again: Something went wrong. Please try again.
policy_signup: By signing up, you confirm that you agree to our Terms of Use and have read and understood our Privacy Policy.
4_digit_verification_code_has_been_sent_: A 4 digit verification code has been sent to

please_turn_on_GPS: To continue please turn on GPS
You_reached_the_maximum_number_orders_da: You reached the maximum number of orders per day.

example_landmark: E.g. Cargills Food City, Colombo Hospital
incorrect_otp: The code that you have entered does not match the code sent to you. Please try again
connection_issue_message: No internet connection. Please make sure WiFI or mobile data is on and try again.
no_contact_message: Create a contact if you need to deliver goods to someone else you love
checkout_note: This is only an approximate delivery date. Actual delivery time will change based on weather conditions and high demand
